creator: AFS Technologies
descriptionHtml:
[BETA]
Cover the whole process from planning to delivery. Achieving a perfect store with the right products in the right locations.

Flexible solution to fit all your business needs, including:

* Customer management
* Territory management
* Routes and customer visits planning
* Campaign management
* Tasks management
* Order placement
* Delivery and stocks management
* Returns
* Receivables and cash collection
* Planogram compliance
* Audit of In-store location of products
* Trade assets audit
* Targets and perfect store KPIs
* Driver's log
* Warehouse inventory management

All with a set of standard interfaces to be integrated with other systems.


______________________________________
Used permissions:
* read calendar events plus confidential information - to be able to show personal calendar events together with planned customer visits

* approximate/precise location (GPS and network-based) - to be able to to show user's location on map and provide other location based services (e.g. informing that user is located in a specified radius from customer or storing where some specific Retail Execution related action happened)

* read and modify the contents of USB storage - to be able to read/write connection settings stored in the shared AFS folder and allow users to add files from external storage as document attachments

* take pictures and videos - to support camera based barcode scanning (when manually triggered by user)

* view wifi and network connections, full network access - to be able to properly communicate and synchronize data with Retail Execution servers or send anonymized usage statistics and crash reports to Google owned services

* pair with Bluetooth devices, access Bluetooth settings - to be able to connect to various Bluetooth devices (e.g. printers or external barcode scanners)

* control vibration - to provide haptic feedback in specific situations (e.g. during drag and drop)
descriptionShort: [BETA] Promote, Sell & Deliver with a single solution!

* Seamless upgrade
* Forms screen redesign

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 7.6 introduces improvements to:
* Monitorings - Possibility to enlarge pictures in DIR
* Deposit process - Availability anytime during the trip; bank and depot deposit available
* Photos - Saving and sharing photos taken into RE
* Deliveries and Goods Returns - Printing copies of documents; display of custom document ID
* Numbers as text support - prices on print-outs can be written in word
* Custom KPI in DIR monitoring
* Receivables validations enhancement
* bugfixes

Flexible solution to fit all your business needs, including:

* Customer management
* Territory management
* Routes and customer visits planning
* Campaign management
* Tasks management
* Order placement
* Delivery and stocks management
* Returns
* Receivables and cash collection
* Planogram compliance
* Audit of In-store location of products
* Trade assets audit
* Targets and perfect store KPIs
* Driver's log
* Warehouse inventory management

All with a set of standard interfaces to be integrated with other systems.


______________________________________
Used permissions:
* read calendar events plus confidential information - to be able to show personal calendar events together with planned customer visits

* approximate/precise location (GPS and network-based) - to be able to to show user's location on map and provide other location based services (e.g. informing that user is located in a specified radius from customer or storing where some specific Retail Execution related action happened)

* read and modify the contents of USB storage - to be able to read/write connection settings stored in the shared AFS folder and allow users to add files from external storage as document attachments

* take pictures and videos - to support camera based barcode scanning (when manually triggered by user)

* view wifi and network connections, full network access - to be able to properly communicate and synchronize data with Retail Execution servers or send anonymized usage statistics and crash reports to Google owned services

* pair with Bluetooth devices, access Bluetooth settings - to be able to connect to various Bluetooth devices (e.g. printers or external barcode scanners)

* control vibration - to provide haptic feedback in specific situations (e.g. during drag and drop)
descriptionShort: [RC] Promote, Sell & Deliver with a single solution!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 7.6 introduces improvements to:
* Monitorings - Possibility to enlarge pictures in DIR
* Deposit process - Availability anytime during the trip - bank and depot deposit available
* Photos - Saving and sharing photos taken into RE
* Deliveries and Goods Returns - Printing copies of documents
* Numbers as text support - prices on print-outs can be written in word
* Custom KPI in DIR monitoring
* Receivables validations enhancement
* Campaigns wizard features
* bugfixes

title: AFS Retail Execution RC

creator: AFS Technologies
descriptionHtml:
[RC]
Cover the whole process from planning to delivery. Achieving a perfect store with the right products in the right locations.

Flexible solution to fit all your business needs, including:

* Customer management
* Territory management
* Routes and customer visits planning
* Campaign management
* Tasks management
* Order placement
* Delivery and stocks management
* Returns
* Receivables and cash collection
* Planogram compliance
* Audit of In-store location of products
* Trade assets audit
* Targets and perfect store KPIs
* Driver's log
* Warehouse inventory management

All with a set of standard interfaces to be integrated with other systems.


______________________________________
Used permissions:
* read calendar events plus confidential information - to be able to show personal calendar events together with planned customer visits

* approximate/precise location (GPS and network-based) - to be able to show user's location on map and provide other location based services (e.g. informing that user is located in a specified radius from customer or storing where some specific Retail Execution related action happened)

* read and modify the contents of USB storage - to be able to read/write connection settings stored in the shared AFS folder and allow users to add files from external storage as document attachments

* take pictures and videos - to support camera based barcode scanning (when manually triggered by user)

* view wifi and network connections, full network access - to be able to properly communicate and synchronize data with Retail Execution servers or send anonymized usage statistics and crash reports to Google owned services

* pair with Bluetooth devices, access Bluetooth settings - to be able to connect to various Bluetooth devices (e.g. printers or external barcode scanners)

* control vibration - to provide haptic feedback in specific situations (e.g. during drag and drop)
descriptionShort: [RC] Promote, Sell & Deliver with a single solution!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 7.12 introduces improvements into modules:
* Gamification: You can earn points by answering certain questions in Forms.
* Discounts: The base price used for calculation of discount % value is based on whether an automatic absolute price discount is applied or not.
* Share of shelf calculation: During monitoring with digital image recognition, the system automatically calculates empty spaces and stores the values in new monitoring questions – Empty linear / Empty facings.
* Bugfixes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 7.14 introduces:
* Activity planning: The visit priority is displayed on the map view.
* Forms: The Photo question supports taking multiple photos.
* Digital merchandising: The historical monitoring supports also a single photo of the shelf.
* Booking sheets: Displaying also the total value of the calculated rebate.
* Gamification: Earn points based on selected answers in a Form More from options question;or for choosing particular answers in Forms and Monitorings.
* Bugfixes

title: Exceedra RE Enterprise RC

creator: AFS Technologies
descriptionHtml:
[RC]
Cover the whole process from planning to delivery. Achieving a perfect store with the right products in the right locations.

Flexible solution to fit all your business needs, including:

* Customer management
* Territory management
* Routes and customer visits planning
* Campaign management
* Tasks management
* Order placement
* Delivery and stocks management
* Returns
* Receivables and cash collection
* Planogram compliance
* Audit of In-store location of products
* Trade assets audit
* Targets and perfect store KPIs
* Driver's log
* Warehouse inventory management

All with a set of standard interfaces to be integrated with other systems.


______________________________________
Used permissions:
* read calendar events plus confidential information - to be able to show personal calendar events together with planned customer visits

* approximate/precise location (GPS and network-based) - to be able to show user's location on map and provide other location based services (e.g. informing that user is located in a specified radius from customer or storing where some specific Retail Execution related action happened)

* read and modify the contents of USB storage - to be able to read/write connection settings stored in the shared AFS folder and allow users to add files from external storage as document attachments

* take pictures and videos - to support camera based barcode scanning (when manually triggered by user)

* view wifi and network connections, full network access - to be able to properly communicate and synchronize data with Retail Execution servers or send anonymized usage statistics and crash reports to Google owned services

* pair with Bluetooth devices, access Bluetooth settings - to be able to connect to various Bluetooth devices (e.g. printers or external barcode scanners)

* control vibration - to provide haptic feedback in specific situations (e.g. during drag and drop)
descriptionShort: [RC] Promote, Sell & Deliver with a single solution!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Ability to tag photos in forms
* Sales folder shows which documents were recently added or updated
* Perfect store KPIs support overachievement
* Monitorings, Forms, and Tasks available only on assigned activity types
* Possibility to delete activity from day/week views
* Order preview displays the shipment tracking information
* Option to create activity directly from delivery ticket
* Highlighting of linked routes during delivery ticket/product transfer
* Bugfixes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Monitoring:
- Moved bulk answer to question context menu in rapid entry
- Introduced new KPI question Shelf level compliance
- Added support for multiple scenes and cropping photos for rapid image recognition
- Added product carousel for faster navigation between products on Smartphone

title: Exceedra RE Enterprise RC

creator: AFS Technologies
descriptionHtml:
[RC]
Cover the whole process from planning to delivery. Achieving a perfect store with the right products in the right locations.

Flexible solution to fit all your business needs, including:

* Customer management
* Territory management
* Routes and customer visits planning
* Campaign management
* Tasks management
* Order placement
* Delivery and stocks management
* Returns
* Receivables and cash collection
* Planogram compliance
* Audit of In-store location of products
* Trade assets audit
* Targets and perfect store KPIs
* Driver's log
* Warehouse inventory management

All with a set of standard interfaces to be integrated with other systems.


______________________________________
Used permissions:
* read calendar events plus confidential information - to be able to show personal calendar events together with planned customer visits

* approximate/precise location (GPS and network-based) - to be able to show user's location on map and provide other location based services (e.g. informing that user is located in a specified radius from customer or storing where some specific Retail Execution related action happened)

* read and modify the contents of USB storage - to be able to read/write connection settings stored in the shared AFS folder and allow users to add files from external storage as document attachments

* take pictures and videos - to support camera based barcode scanning (when manually triggered by user)

* view wifi and network connections, full network access - to be able to properly communicate and synchronize data with Retail Execution servers or send anonymized usage statistics and crash reports to Google owned services

* pair with Bluetooth devices, access Bluetooth settings - to be able to connect to various Bluetooth devices (e.g. printers or external barcode scanners)

* control vibration - to provide haptic feedback in specific situations (e.g. during drag and drop)
descriptionShort: [RC] Promote, Sell & Deliver with a single solution!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Monitoring:
- Moved bulk answer to question context menu in rapid entry
- Introduced new KPI question Shelf level compliance
- Added support for multiple scenes and cropping photos for rapid image recognition
- Added product carousel for faster navigation between products on Smartphone

Inventory:
- Ability to print audit draft during blind and manual audits

Bugfixes
